bio:treatment.description: Plants not rhizomatous. Culms stout, 2-5 mm thick. Uppermost sheaths usually 2.6-6 mm wide. Panicles with 30-90 spikelets per cm2 when pressed. Fruits 1-1.8 mm.
bio:treatment.discussion: Sporobolus compositus var. compositus is the most widespread of the three varieties, being found throughÂ¬out most of the range shown for the species, but not in South Carolina or Florida.
